# Entropic Shield, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Shining South (WotC), pg. 46

This spell functions like *[[Entropic Shield (Spell)|entropic shield]]*, except that it affects multiple creatures.
